context_bundle.summary: Progressive delivery extends GitOps with controlled rollouts using canary deployments, feature flags, and gradual traffic shifting

onboarding.quick_start: kubectl apply -f canary.yaml && argocd rollouts status rollout -n default my-app --watch
common_patterns: Canary deployment: 'argocd rollouts set image rollout my-app container=image:1.2.0' and 'argocd rollouts promote rollout my-app'
Traffic splitting: 'VirtualService with destination weights: 90 for stable, 10 for canary
Analysis templates: 'AnalysisTemplate with metrics queries and success criteria thresholds'
Feature flags: 'launchdarkly sdk key' and 'if (ldClient.variation('new-feature', user, false))'
Blue-green: 'kubectl apply -f blue.yaml && kubectl patch service my-app -p '{"spec":{"selector":{"version":"blue"}}}'
A/B testing: 'Istio VirtualService with HTTPRouteDestination and headers matching'
known_errors: Rollout stuck: 'argocd rollouts get rollout my-app -o yaml' and check status conditions
Traffic not shifting: 'istioctl proxy-config routes <pod>' and verify VirtualService configuration
Analysis failing: 'kubectl get analysisruns' and check metric collection and threshold values
Feature flag not working: 'ldClient.waitForInitialization()' and verify SDK key and user context
Service switching error: 'kubectl get endpoints my-app' and verify pod selectors match labels
